headlines.headline: Why Stephen A. doesn't believe this is LeBron's last year
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith explains why he believes LeBron James will play another year in the NBA after this one.

headlines.headline: Could LeBron finish career back with Cavs?
headlines.description: Brian Windhorst details what it would take for LeBron James to finish his career with the Lakers, Cavaliers or another team.

headlines.headline: NBA buzz: Latest updates, trades, intel ahead of Feb. 5 deadline
headlines.description: Catch up on the latest buzz, trade alerts and league intel from our ESPN NBA insiders.

headlines.headline: The biggest questions for the Warriors ahead of the NBA trade deadline
headlines.description: Can the Warriors make a deal for Giannis Antetokounmpo? The biggest questions one week out from the deadline.

headlines.headline: Why the Wizards hope Trae Young trade can unlock Alex Sarr
headlines.description: The four-time All-Star wasn't brought in to be a franchise savior, the Wizards say. He was brought in to cultivate the player they believe is their next one, former No. 2 pick Alex Sarr.

headlines.headline: Minnesota faces Oklahoma City in conference matchup
headlines.description: Oklahoma City Thunder (38-10, first in the Western Conference) vs. Minnesota Timberwolves (29-19, sixth in the Western Conference)

headlines.headline: Seth Rollins: CM Punk is my Green Bay Packers
headlines.description: Bears fan Seth Rollins joins "Get Up" ahead of Saturday's Royal Rumble, trolling CM Punk and Dan Orlovsky after the Bears beat the Packers in the NFL wild-card round.

headlines.headline: Why are the Eagles having a hard time finding a new OC?
headlines.description: Taylor Lewan and Will Compton weigh in on the Eagles' offensive coordinator search.

headlines.headline: NFL teams to miss playoffs and win Super Bowl the next year
headlines.description: The Tampa Bay Buccaneers were the last NFL team to miss the playoffs but win the Super Bowl the following year. Check out who else makes the list.

headlines.headline: Which NFL team has the most Super Bowl wins?
headlines.description: There have been many memorable Super Bowls, but which teams have won the most rings? Check out this all-time winners list for more information.

headlines.headline: Orlovsky: Maye will have to play best game of the season for Patriots to win
headlines.description: Adam Schefter and Dan Orlovsky discuss Drake Maye's minor shoulder injury and what he will need to do to win vs. Seattle.

headlines.headline: Why Todd Monken's hiring causes issues for Browns, Giants
headlines.description: Adam Schefter and Andrew Hawkins discuss the ramifications of Todd Monken's hiring on the Browns and Giants.

headlines.headline: Gold or bust? X factors for all 12 men's Olympic hockey teams
headlines.description: Who's going to win at the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics? How these specific players perform could make the difference.

headlines.headline: Islanders visit the Rangers in Metropolitan Division play
headlines.description: New York Islanders (29-19-5, in the Metropolitan Division) vs. New York Rangers (22-26-6, in the Metropolitan Division)

headlines.headline: Canadiens take on the Avalanche following overtime victory
headlines.description: Colorado Avalanche (35-7-9, in the Central Division) vs. Montreal Canadiens (29-17-7, in the Atlantic Division)

headlines.headline: Senators hand league-leading Avalanche 3rd loss in 4 games with 5-2 victory
headlines.description: — Tim Stutzle had a goal and an assist, Artem Zub added two assists and the Ottawa Senators defeated the league-leading Colorado Avalanche 5-2 on Wednesday night.

headlines.headline: Blue Jackets beat Flyers 5-3 for third straight win
headlines.description: — Charlie Coyle had a goal and an assist and the Columbus Blue Jackets beat the Philadelphia Flyers 5-3 on Wednesday night for their third straight win.
